# /=(_:_:)

**Operator**

Computes element-wise multiplication.

## Declaration

```swift
static func /= (lhs: inout MLTensor, rhs: MLTensor)
```

## Discussion

Shapes must be broadcastable, where the broadcasted shape becomes the shape of the output.

## Performing arithmetic operations

- ***(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise multiplication.
- ***=(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise multiplication.
- **+(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise addition.
- **+=(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise addition.
- **-(_:)**: Returns the negation of the tensor.
- **-(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise subtraction.
- **-=(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise subtraction.
- **.!(_:)**: Computes logical not on the tensor’s elements.
- **.!=(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise inequality between two tensors.
- **.&(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise logical AND where both operands are expected contain Boolean scalar elements.
- **.==(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise equality between two tensors.
- **.>(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise greater comparison between two tensors.
- **.<(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise less comparison between two tensors.
- **.|(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise logical OR where both operands are expected contain Boolean scalar elements.
- **.^(_:_:)**: Computes element-wise logical XOR where both operands are expected contain Boolean scalar elements.
